name: Hyper Universe - Most Popular Starter Pack
detailed_description:
Hyper Universe isn’t a popularity contest, but that shouldn’t keep you from assembling the coolest fighting squad in the room. Download the Hyper Universe Most Popular Starter Pack and unlock our four most-played Hyper characters. This DLC not only gives you access to Aisha, Cain, Kurenai, and Admiral W, as well as their own unique equipment, but also recolor skins for all Hypers in this pack!

This pack contains the following:

Hypers and their unique equipment
  • Aisha
  • Cain
  • Kurenai
  • Admiral W

Skins
  • Aisha “Cotton Candy Girl” Recolor Skin
  • Cain “Soul Collector” Recolor Skin
  • Kurenai “Fading Form” Recolor Skin
  • Admiral W “Sea Renegade” Recolor Skin

All of their unique equipment

To redeem this package in-game please do the following:
Instructions:
1. Purchase DLC
2. Launch client
3. Go to Hyper Shop
4. Click "Purchased Items"
5. Redeem Items

*Please note that any items already owned from this pack upon purchase will not be credited or refunded.

short_description: Grab our 4 most-played Hypers—Aisha, Cain, Kurenai, and Admiral W—along with all of their unique equipment and recolor skins; you’ll be well on your way to becoming the king or queen of the brawl.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese-Brazil
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 7 32-bit
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core or better
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9600 or better AMD Radeon HD 4830 or better
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 650 or better AMD Radeon HD 7750 or better
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
